type: Janitorial Services 3, 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick
short_summary: The contract requires janitorial services for buildings located at 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick from July 1, 2024 to June 30, 2025, with an option to extend for two additional years.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the furnishing of all cleaning materials, labour, tools, equipment, supervision, travel and profit, required to provide complete janitorial services for the various buildings located at 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick.
full_summary:
================================

**Tender Announcement for Janitorial Services at 5 CDSB Gagetown**

**Title (EN) & (FR):** W6898-240677 - Janitorial Services 3, 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick / W6898-240677 Services de Conciergerie 3, BS 5 Div CA Gagetown, Nouveau-Brunswick

**Reference Number:** WS4495766563-Doc4511778133
**Solicitation Number:** WS4495766563

**Procurement Details:**
================================

* **Publication Date:** 2024-03-28
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-15T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2024-05-09
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-07-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-06-30 (with optional two-year extension)

**Procurement Category:** SRV
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Trade Agreements:** Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and others

**Procurement Location:**
================================

* **Region of Opportunity:** New Brunswick
* **Region of Delivery:** 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick

**Contracting Authority:**
==========================

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:** Kristelle LeBlanc, kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19246378

**Tender Description:**
======================

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a service provider for janitorial services at 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick. The contract will cover the period from July 1, 2024, to June 30, 2025, with optional two-year extensions. The successful bidder will be required to provide all necessary cleaning materials, labour, tools, equipment, supervision, travel, and profit to maintain the cleanliness of various buildings at the site. It is strongly recommended that bidders attend a site visit on April 10, 2024.
